item.title: GIMP How to make fuzzy border transparent
item.description: Do not use the “Flatten Image” option. A new layer will be created containing only the border (this layer will be the active layer). Perform “Layer->Transparency->Alpha to Selection” Perform “Layer->Delete”. (you don’t need this layer any more) Perform “Layer->Transparency->Add Alpha Channel” (if possible) Perform “Edit->Clear” Note: the “Layer” commands are also available on the context menu accessed by right-clicking on the layer’s thumbnail preview in the Layer Dialog.
